quotes.quote: I'm a free spirit. A spirit that evolves. I'm a diamond. I'm just refining it. Polishing it. Glossing it up.
Let your mind be set free from the control of others influence.
Every renaissance comes to the world with a cry, the cry of the human spirit to be free.
I am a wild woman, it would take a warrior to tame my spirit.
One radical free spirit nonconformist is pretty much like another.
Here the free spirit of mankind, at length, Throws its last fetters off; and who shall place A limit to the giant's unchained strength, Or curb his swiftness in the forward race?
I am a free spirit. I tell the truth, and I like to mix it up.
There are incalculable resources in the human spirit, once it has been set free.
I realize I'm a free spirit. I like to be happy. I have to have more control of my happiness.
You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
I die, as I have lived, a free spirit, an Anarchist, owing no allegiance to rulers, heavenly or earthly.
If you try to tame her she will fly away, because pretty little spirits like her, never like to be caged.
I am living breathing freedom
He had a free spirit. He was so far-reaching, he's the person who likes the wind in his hair.
Your happiness doesn't come free, but you need to be free to be happy.
I like to be a free spirit. Some don't like that, but that's the way I am
A free spirit takes liberties even with liberty itself.
The only way to deal with an unfree world is to become so absolutely free that your very existence is an act of rebellion.
You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
I am a leaf on the wind. Watch how I soar!
They can't chain my spirit! My spirit runs free! Walls can't contain it! Laws can't restrain it! Authority has no power over it!
The human spirit: Unbreakable. Relentless. Free.
I'm a free spirit and that definitely comes from my upbringing, so it's definitely shaped me as an artist.
Release your majestic mind, embrace your untamed inner spirit. Break free from captivity, avoid society.. You were born to be free.
